snippet: Two men from Mobile were charged on Tuesday with plotting a terrorist attack in West Africa.
abstract: Alabama men Mohammad Abdul Rahman Abukhdair and Randy Wilson are arrested by FBI agents and charged with plotting terrorist attack in West Africa.
lead_paragraph: Two men from Mobile were charged on Tuesday with plotting a terrorist attack in West Africa.

headline.seo: Two Accused of Terror Plot in Alabama
headline.main: Alabama: Two Accused of Terror Plot
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Two Accused of Terror Plot
